text: In the style of Factory Records album artwork, a 12", Single Rock style cover for the Post-Punk album "Art - Dream - Dominion" by Royal Family And The Poor from 1982

In the style of Factory Records album artwork, a LP, Album Electronic style cover for the Experimental album "The Project Phase 1 - The Temple Of The 13th Tribe" by Royal Family And The Poor from 1984
In the style of Factory Records album artwork, a 7", Single, Pic, TP Rock style cover for the Avantgarde album "We Love The Moon" by Royal Family And The Poor from 1986
